scripts.dev: rm -rf ./dist/ && mkdir dist && cp -r assets ./dist/assets && npx parcel *.html --public-url='/'
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist/ && mkdir dist && cp -r assets ./dist/assets && npx parcel build *.html --public-url='/headmaze/'
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'deploy' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.build-and-deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
